item.description:
Come join us for another night at Johnny Ds in Somerville to see the excellent Steely Dan cover band, No Static! This band has a huge fan base, and several Sitz members count ourselves as part of it! There is a $12 cash cover at the door.

Please see the link below for all the Steely Dan songs that No Static plays:

http://www.nostaticband.com/music.htm

The show begins at 9:45 so we'll meet at 9:30. Please indicate in your RSVP if you would like to join for dinner before the show (at 8:45). There is a $10 food minimum per person.

We look forward to a fun night with lots of dancing!
item.name: No Static Plays Steely Dan
